turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, Bill. Can you order me some pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, dude. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizzeria Luigi! It's where it's at!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right on dude. The plain cheese, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not this time, Bill. I'm thinking custom pies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool, man. What you want on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sausage and mushrooms!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just two toppings? You cheap, yo!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fine! Throw some caramalized onions on it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it! Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope! All set!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sweet! Which location are you going to pick this up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to be near the Golden Hills area, so let's you do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I got a custom pie with sausage, mushrooms and caramalized onions to be picked up at the Golden Hills location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ah... You know what, Bill? I'm going to pass on the onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, what? No onions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah. I want me some ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right on. So sausage, mushrooms and ham from Golden Hills' Pizzeria Luigi?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it, Bill.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, bro. Your pie should be ready in about 25 to 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sweet! Can I get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will send that to your phone, digitally!
